amp_feedback_loop.opt1.label: Embrace it [+200 Score]
amp_feedback_loop.opt2.label: Fix it fast [Technical]
amp_feedback_loop.title: FEEDBACK SCREAM
atm_fee_trap.desc: You withdraw cash and get hit with ridiculous fees.
atm_fee_trap.opt1.label: Pay the fee [-10€]
atm_fee_trap.opt2.label: Cancel and search another ATM [-0.5h]
atm_fee_trap.opt2.outcome: You walk around like a lost NPC.
atm_fee_trap.title: ATM FEE TRAP
backstage_argument.desc: A small comment turns into a big fight five minutes before stage.
backstage_argument.opt1.label: Calm everyone down [Charisma]
backstage_argument.opt2.label: Let them vent [-5 Harmony, +5 Mood]
backstage_argument.title: BACKSTAGE ARGUMENT
band_bonding_walk.desc: You have two hours to kill. Someone suggests a walk together.
band_bonding_walk.opt1.label: Go together [+8 Harmony, +5 Mood]
band_bonding_walk.opt1.outcome: You talk like humans for once.
band_bonding_walk.opt2.label: Stay alone [+5 Mood]
band_bonding_walk.title: BONDING WALK
band_meeting.desc: You need to talk about expectations. Nobody wants to.
band_meeting.opt1.label: Do it properly [Charisma]
band_meeting.opt2.label: Skip it
band_meeting.title: BAND MEETING
band_photo_day.desc: You promised new press photos. Nobody is ready.
band_photo_day.opt1.label: Do it properly [-20€]
band_photo_day.opt1.outcome: At least you look like a real band.
band_photo_day.opt2.label: DIY photos [+5 Mood]
band_photo_day.opt2.outcome: You shoot it in a parking garage. Somehow works.
band_photo_day.title: BAND PHOTO DAY
band_prank.desc: Someone swapped your strings with ancient rusty ones as a “joke”.
band_prank.opt1.label: Laugh it off [+5 Mood]
band_prank.opt2.label: Get angry [-8 Harmony]
band_prank.title: TOUR PRANK
broken_cable_bulk.desc: Half your cables crackle. It’s like the van is cursed.
broken_cable_bulk.opt1.label: Buy a bundle [-60€]
broken_cable_bulk.opt2.label: Keep using them [-5 Mood]
broken_cable_bulk.opt2.outcome: Every show becomes a coin flip.
broken_cable_bulk.title: CABLE DISASTER
broken_drum_head.desc: Marius cracked a drum head. Again.
broken_drum_head.opt1.label: Replace it [-35€]
broken_drum_head.opt2.label: Tape it up [Skill]
broken_drum_head.title: BROKEN DRUM HEAD
broken_merch_box.desc: Your merch box fell apart during load-in.
broken_merch_box.opt1.label: Replace stock [-100€]
broken_merch_box.opt2.label: Sell damaged ones cheap [+50€]
broken_merch_box.title: MERCH BOX COLLAPSE
broken_phone_screen.desc: Your phone slips during load-out. Crunch.
broken_phone_screen.opt1.label: Repair [-90€]
broken_phone_screen.opt2.label: Live with it [-5 Mood]
broken_phone_screen.title: BROKEN PHONE SCREEN
cheap_hotel_or_van.desc: It’s late. Do you pay for beds or sleep in the van?
cheap_hotel_or_van.opt1.label: Hotel [-120€, +15 Stamina]
cheap_hotel_or_van.opt2.label: Van sleep [+0€, -5 Mood]
cheap_hotel_or_van.title: SLEEP CHOICE
consequences_bandmate_scandal.desc: {{egoFocus}} was photographed at the afterparty in a compromising situation.
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt1.label: Stand behind them [+20 Controversy, +10 Harmony, +15 Loyalty]
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt1.outco: The band sticks together. The media hates it, but the diehards love the loyalty.
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt2.label: Distance yourself [-10 Controversy, -20 Harmony]
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt2.outco: You threw them under the bus. Standard PR move.
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt3.d_133: Your excuse made no sense. Everyone is laughing at you.
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt3.d_fc9: You completely flipped the story! Masterclass in PR.
consequences_bandmate_scandal.opt3.label: Counter-narrative [Charisma 8]
consequences_bandmate_scandal.title: BANDMATE SCANDAL
consequences_cancel_culture_quest.desc: The backlash has reached critical mass. Hashtags about cancelling the band are trending globally.
consequences_cancel_culture_quest.opt1.o: Time to eat humble pie in front of everyone.
consequences_cancel_culture_quest.opt2.o: You vanish from the internet. The storm passes, but you lose your hardcore fans.
consequences_cancel_culture_quest.title: THE INTERNET HAS SPOKEN
consequences_comeback_album.desc: After completing the apology tour and cleaning up your image, labels are interested again.
consequences_comeback_album.opt1.label: Sign EP deal [+500€, +200 Fame, +25 Loyalty, -20 Controversy]
consequences_comeback_album.opt1.outcome: You sold out a little, but the comeback EP is a hit!
consequences_comeback_album.opt2.label: Self-release [+40 Loyalty, +2 Viral]
consequences_comeback_album.opt2.outcome: You stayed indie. The fans respect the hustle.
consequences_comeback_album.title: THE COMEBACK IS REAL
consequences_ego_breakup_threat.desc: The tension in the van is unbearable. Someone is about to quit the band.
consequences_ego_breakup_threat.opt1.lab: Try to save the band [+5 Harmony]
consequences_ego_breakup_threat.opt1.out: You beg them to stay. It's going to take work to fix this.
consequences_ego_breakup_threat.opt2.out: The band is over. Time to get a real job.
consequences_ego_breakup_threat.title: BREAKUP THREAT
consequences_ticket_sales_collapse.desc: Promoters are threatening to cancel gigs due to low pre-sales and recent controversies.
Tickets are cheaper. Real fans appreciate it.
You threw money at the problem. It somewhat helped.
consequences_ticket_sales_collapse.title: TICKET SALES COLLAPSE
consequences_venue_complaint.desc: The venue manager is furious about your recent performance and demands compensation.
consequences_venue_complaint.opt1.label: Apologize [-100€, -10 Controversy, +5 Loyalty]
consequences_venue_complaint.opt1.outcom: You paid them off. Fans noticed the humility.
consequences_venue_complaint.opt2.label: Ignore [+15 Controversy, -5 Harmony]
consequences_venue_complaint.opt2.outcom: You walk away, but the internet doesn't forget.
consequences_venue_complaint.opt3.d_53d0: You talked your way out of it smoothly.
consequences_venue_complaint.opt3.d_d21d: They didn't buy it. The backlash is worse.
consequences_venue_complaint.opt3.label: Deny [Charisma 7]
consequences_venue_complaint.title: VENUE COMPLAINT
creative_high.desc: A new riff appears out of nowhere. Everyone is smiling.
creative_high.opt1.label: Capture it [+10 Mood, +5 Harmony]
creative_high.opt1.outcome: You record a demo on a phone mic.
creative_high.title: CREATIVE HIGH
crisis_bad_review.desc: A metal blog just posted a savage breakdown of your last performance. Screenshots are spreading fast.
crisis_bad_review.opt1.label: Say nothing (absorb the hit)
crisis_bad_review.opt1.outcome: The review stays up and keeps circulating.
crisis_bad_review.opt2.d_0f6b: You came off defensive. It went viral for all the wrong reasons.
crisis_bad_review.opt2.d_5509: Your measured response earned you respect.
crisis_bad_review.opt2.label: Respond professionally [Charisma]
crisis_bad_review.opt3.label: Own it — post a self-aware apology
crisis_bad_review.opt3.outcome: Acknowledging the bad show felt honest. Real fans respect the humility.
crisis_bad_review.title: BAD REVIEW ONLINE
crisis_ego_clash.desc: The constant spotlight on one member has finally boiled over into a full screaming match in the van.
crisis_ego_clash.opt1.d_26fc: You managed to de-escalate the situation before punches were thrown.
crisis_ego_clash.opt1.d_7dcd: You just made it worse. Someone stormed out into the rain.
crisis_ego_clash.opt1.label: Intervene and mediate [Charisma]
crisis_ego_clash.opt2.label: Let them fight it out
crisis_ego_clash.opt2.outcome: The argument leaked online. The band is barely holding together.
crisis_ego_clash.title: EGO CLASH
crisis_leaked_story.desc: An anonymous source leaked an embarrassing, out-of-context story about the band to a major music drama channel.
crisis_leaked_story.opt1.label: Let true fans defend you (Loyalty Shield)
crisis_leaked_story.opt1.outcome: Your hardcore fanbase went to war in the comments, shutting down the rumors. They are exhausted, but it worked.
crisis_leaked_story.opt2.label: Deny everything
crisis_leaked_story.opt2.outcome: The denial looked suspicious. The rumors only grew louder.
crisis_leaked_story.title: LEAKED RUMORS
crisis_mass_unfollow.desc: A dedicated hate-campaign has started trending. People are unfollowing you in droves to avoid association.
crisis_mass_unfollow.opt1.label: Watch the numbers drop
crisis_mass_unfollow.opt1.outcome: You lost thousands of followers, but the ones remaining are your true cult.
crisis_mass_unfollow.title: MASS UNFOLLOW
crisis_notice_100.desc: You have been completely shadowbanned. Your follower count is actively shrinking, and the industry has blacklisted you.
crisis_notice_100.opt1.label: Are we cancelled?
crisis_notice_100.title: SHADOWBANNED
crisis_notice_50.desc: Your controversy has reached a boiling point. Venues and sponsors are starting to get nervous. Harmony is draining faster.
crisis_notice_50.opt1.label: We need to be careful
crisis_notice_50.title: WARNING SIGNS
crisis_notice_80.desc: The platforms have labeled your account as problematic. Your growth is severely restricted, and sponsors are dropping out.
crisis_notice_80.opt1.label: This is bad
crisis_notice_80.opt1.outcome: You are fighting an uphill battle now.
crisis_notice_80.title: ALGORITHM PENALTY
crisis_online_backlash.desc: A thread calling out your "problematic" stage antics has hit 10k shares. The algorithm is not your friend today.
crisis_online_backlash.opt1.label: Ride it out (no response)
crisis_online_backlash.opt1.outcome: The thread grows. Band morale suffers under the noise.
crisis_online_backlash.opt2.label: Hire PR damage control [-250€]
crisis_online_backlash.opt2.outcome: A professional spun the narrative. It cost you, but the thread died down.
crisis_online_backlash.opt3.d_34b9: It looked forced. The internet smelled desperation.
crisis_online_backlash.opt3.d_ab89: The stripped-down session melted hearts. Controversy forgotten.
crisis_online_backlash.opt3.label: Release raw acoustic session [Charisma]
crisis_online_backlash.opt3.outcome: You recorded a heartfelt session in the van.
crisis_online_backlash.title: ONLINE BACKLASH
crisis_poor_performance.desc: Word is spreading about your terrible performance last night. Fans are demanding refunds.
crisis_poor_performance.opt1.d_04df: People bought your excuse, but industry folks noticed the shifting blame.
crisis_poor_performance.opt1.d_b07b: The sound guy posted the raw stems. You sounded awful. Backlash is immense.
crisis_poor_performance.opt1.label: Blame the sound engineer [Charisma]
crisis_poor_performance.opt1.outcome: You fired off an angry tweet.
crisis_poor_performance.opt2.label: Issue a humble apology
crisis_poor_performance.opt2.outcome: You admitted you had a bad night. True fans respect the honesty.
crisis_poor_performance.title: DISASTROUS GIG
crisis_redemption_charity.desc: A local non-profit reached out. They need a headliner for a benefit show. It won't pay anything — but the goodwill might.
crisis_redemption_charity.opt1.label: Play the charity show (free)
crisis_redemption_charity.opt1.outcome: You played your hearts out. The crowd knew it mattered. The internet noticed.
crisis_redemption_charity.opt2.label: Donate gig proceeds instead [-200€]
crisis_redemption_charity.opt2.outcome: You posted the donation publicly. Some cynics called it PR. Most fans were moved.
crisis_redemption_charity.opt3.label: Decline — not the right time
crisis_redemption_charity.opt3.outcome: The band argued about it for two hours. You move on.
crisis_redemption_charity.title: REDEMPTION OFFER
crisis_shadowban_scare.desc: Your posts are reaching 12 people. Something is very wrong. The platform has buried you.
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt1.label: Nuke all controversial posts
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt1.outcome: You wiped your history. Some fans felt betrayed. Controversy slowly recedes.
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt2.d_06a9: Genuine. Raw. The fans who stayed became your most loyal soldiers.
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt2.d_b90e: It read like a PR stunt. The backlash doubled.
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt2.label: Post a long public apology [Charisma]
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt2.outcome: You typed and deleted and typed again.
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt3.label: Lean in — go full chaos mode
crisis_shadowban_scare.opt3.outcome: You doubled down on everything. The chaos got eyeballs. The band is not okay.
crisis_shadowban_scare.title: ALGORITHMIC DEATH
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.desc: Your brand partner's legal team sent a message. Clean up your act or the deal is void.
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt1.label: Promise to clean up your image
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt1.outcome: You agreed to tone it down. The band is not thrilled. The sponsor stays — for now.
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt2.d_0dd7: Your rebellion went viral. True fans rallied. The sponsor went away, but so did half the controversy.
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt2.d_cc26: They sued. You lost the deal and paid legal costs. The controversy spiralled.
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt2.label: Call them out publicly [Charisma]
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt2.outcome: You posted a very direct response.
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt3.label: Negotiate reduced obligations [-100€]
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.opt3.outcome: You hired a cheap lawyer. A compromise was reached. Nobody is happy.
crisis_sponsor_ultimatum.title: SPONSOR ULTIMATUM
crisis_venue_cancels.desc: The venue manager left a voicemail. They have "concerns about your current public image" and are pulling your upcoming booking.
crisis_venue_cancels.opt1.label: Accept the cancellation [-150€ deposit]
crisis_venue_cancels.opt1.outcome: You eat the deposit. Another city, another door closed.
crisis_venue_cancels.opt2.d_73a7: The negotiation turned ugly. You lost the deposit and they charged a cancellation fee.
crisis_venue_cancels.opt2.d_c2c9: You convinced them to keep the booking. They added a clause: "no incidents."
crisis_venue_cancels.opt2.label: Negotiate hard [Charisma]
crisis_venue_cancels.opt3.label: Book a DIY squat show instead
crisis_venue_cancels.opt3.outcome: You found an abandoned warehouse. The show was legendary. Screw the venue.
crisis_venue_cancels.title: BOOKING CANCELLED
crowd_surf_disaster.desc: Someone falls during a crowd surf.
crowd_surf_disaster.opt1.label: Stop show [-500 Score]
crowd_surf_disaster.opt2.label: Keep playing [+300 Score, -5 Mood]
crowd_surf_disaster.title: CROWD SURF GONE WRONG
damaged_merch_print.desc: Some shirts have a misprint. It’s… kinda cool?
damaged_merch_print.opt1.label: Sell as “limited error edition” [+60€]
damaged_merch_print.opt2.label: Trash them [-20€]
damaged_merch_print.title: DAMAGED PRINT
deal_devil.desc: A man in a suit offers you a golden pick.
deal_devil.opt1.label: Take it
deal_devil.opt2.label: Refuse
deal_devil.title: THE CROSSROADS
ego_clash.desc: Marius wants a longer drum solo. Everyone else disagrees.
ego_clash.opt1.label: Let him have it [+5 Harmony]
ego_clash.opt2.label: Shut it down [-10 Harmony]
ego_clash.title: EGO CLASH
ego_clash_2.desc: Lars wants to “rebrand” the band mid-tour. Marius wants to sleep.
ego_clash_2.opt1.label: Hear him out [+5 Mood, -5 Time]
ego_clash_2.opt2.label: Shut it down [+5 Stamina, -5 Harmony]
ego_clash_2.title: EGO CLASH II
flat_battery.desc: The van won’t start at a rest stop.
flat_battery.opt1.label: Jump start [-1h]
flat_battery.opt2.label: Call help [-80€]
flat_battery.title: FLAT BATTERY
forgotten_lyrics.desc: Someone admits they forgot a verse. On tour. Right now.
forgotten_lyrics.opt1.label: Rehearse quickly [-5 Time]
forgotten_lyrics.opt2.label: Improvise [Charisma]
forgotten_lyrics.title: FORGOTTEN LYRICS
fuel_leak.opt1.label: Fix immediately [-150€, -2h]
fuel_leak.opt2.label: Ignore it [Luck]
fuel_leak.title: FUEL LEAK
fuel_price_spike.desc: The next station is absurdly expensive.
fuel_price_spike.opt1.label: Pay it [-40€]
fuel_price_spike.opt2.label: Search for cheaper [Luck]
fuel_price_spike.title: FUEL PRICE SPIKE
fuel_warning_light.desc: The fuel light turns on. You all pretend not to see it.
fuel_warning_light.opt1.label: Refuel now [-40€]
fuel_warning_light.opt2.label: Risk it [Luck]
fuel_warning_light.title: FUEL WARNING LIGHT
gas_station_encounter.desc: At the petrol station, someone recognizes the band shirt.
gas_station_encounter.opt1.d_0466: It was a fan! Free coffee.
gas_station_encounter.opt1.label: Chat with them
gas_station_encounter.opt2.label: Ignore
gas_station_encounter.title: GAS STATION ENCOUNTER
gear_theft.desc: Someone broke into the van and stole a pedalboard!
gear_theft.opt1.label: Buy replacement [-300€]
gear_theft.opt2.outcome: You found a used one on Kleinanzeigen.
gear_theft.opt3.label: Play without it [-10 Harmony]
gear_theft.title: GEAR THEFT
gear_upgrade_argument.desc: Matze insists he needs a new amp “for the tone”.
gear_upgrade_argument.opt1.label: Approve purchase [-200€]
gear_upgrade_argument.opt2.label: Say no [Charisma]
gear_upgrade_argument.title: GEAR UPGRADE ARGUMENT
ghost_backstage.desc: You swear you hear a crowd cheering in an empty hallway.
ghost_backstage.opt1.label: Follow the sound [Luck]
ghost_backstage.opt2.label: Ignore it
ghost_backstage.title: GHOST BACKSTAGE
gig_intro_dead_air.desc: The intro track fails. The room stares at you.
gig_intro_dead_air.opt1.label: Start raw [+10 Hype]
gig_intro_dead_air.opt2.label: Fix it quickly [Tech]
gig_intro_dead_air.title: DEAD AIR
gig_intro_drunk_fan.opt1.label: Ignore
gig_intro_drunk_fan.opt2.label: Mock him
gig_intro_drunk_fan.title: DRUNK HECKLER
gig_intro_huge_cheer.desc: The room erupts when you walk on stage. Unexpected.
gig_intro_huge_cheer.opt1.label: Ride it [+300 Score, +10 Hype]
gig_intro_huge_cheer.title: HUGE CHEER
gig_intro_monitor_fail.desc: Monitors cut out right as you start.
gig_intro_monitor_fail.opt1.label: Play through it [-200 Score]
gig_intro_monitor_fail.opt1.outcome: You guess your way through the first song.
gig_intro_monitor_fail.opt2.label: Signal the tech [Charisma]
gig_intro_monitor_fail.opt2.outcome: You try to communicate with gestures and panic.
gig_intro_monitor_fail.title: NO MONITORS
gig_intro_wrong_song.desc: Someone starts the wrong song. Everybody notices.
gig_intro_wrong_song.opt1.label: Laugh and switch [Charisma]
gig_intro_wrong_song.opt1.outcome: You try to make it charming.
gig_intro_wrong_song.opt2.label: Power through [-300 Score]
gig_intro_wrong_song.title: WRONG START
gig_mid_bad_mix.desc: Everything sounds like mud. You can’t fix the room.
gig_mid_bad_mix.opt1.label: Play simpler [+80 Score]
gig_mid_bad_mix.opt2.label: Get angry [-150 Score, -5 Mood]
gig_mid_bad_mix.title: BAD MIX NIGHT
gig_mid_broken_stick.opt1.label: Keep going [-120 Score]
gig_mid_broken_stick.opt1.outcome: He improvises with half a stick.
gig_mid_broken_stick.opt2.label: Throw spare to Marius [Luck]
gig_mid_broken_stick.title: BROKEN STICK
gig_mid_crowd_chant.desc: The crowd starts chanting your name mid-set.
gig_mid_crowd_chant.opt1.label: Acknowledge [+10 Hype]
gig_mid_crowd_chant.opt2.label: Stay focused [+100 Score]
gig_mid_crowd_chant.title: CROWD CHANT
gig_mid_feedback.desc: A sudden feedback howl cuts through the mix.
gig_mid_feedback.opt1.label: Make it a moment [+120 Score]
gig_mid_feedback.opt2.label: Kill it fast [Tech]
gig_mid_feedback.title: FEEDBACK HOWL
gig_mid_mic_cut.opt1.label: Let the crowd sing [+200 Score]
gig_mid_mic_cut.opt2.label: Swap mic [Tech]
gig_mid_mic_cut.title: MIC CUTS OUT
gig_mid_perfect_breakdown.desc: Everything locks in. The pit explodes.
gig_mid_perfect_breakdown.opt1.label: FEED IT [+500 Score]
gig_mid_perfect_breakdown.title: PERFECT BREAKDOWN
gig_mid_pick_drop.desc: Your pick flies into the void mid-riff.
gig_mid_pick_drop.opt1.label: Finger it (dangerous) [-150 Score]
gig_mid_pick_drop.opt2.label: Grab a spare [Tech]
gig_mid_pick_drop.opt2.outcome: You dive for the mic stand tape-picks.
gig_mid_pick_drop.title: PICK DROP
gig_mid_power_dip.desc: The lights flicker. The amp sounds… worried.
gig_mid_power_dip.opt1.label: Keep playing [Luck]
gig_mid_power_dip.opt2.label: Signal to cut a song [-100 Score]
gig_mid_power_dip.opt2.outcome: You shorten the set to survive.
gig_mid_power_dip.title: POWER DIP
gig_mid_stage_diver.desc: Someone attempts a stage dive at the worst possible time.
gig_mid_stage_diver.opt1.label: Let it happen [+200 Score]
gig_mid_stage_diver.opt2.label: Wave them off [-80 Score]
gig_mid_stage_diver.title: STAGE DIVER
gig_mid_string_tuning_drift.desc: The guitar slowly slips out of tune under hot lights.
gig_mid_string_tuning_drift.opt1.label: Tune quickly [Tech]
gig_mid_string_tuning_drift.opt1.outcome: You tune between parts like a machine.
gig_mid_string_tuning_drift.opt2.label: Ignore it [-200 Score]
gig_mid_string_tuning_drift.opt2.outcome: The crowd hears it. You hear it more.
gig_mid_string_tuning_drift.title: TUNING DRIFT
gig_mid_strings_snapped.desc: A sharp TWANG sounds from the guitar amp.
gig_mid_strings_snapped.opt1.label: Keep playing (Miss notes)
gig_mid_strings_snapped.opt2.label: Change it fast [Tech]
gig_mid_strings_snapped.title: STRING SNAPPED!
gig_mid_tempo_wobble.desc: The band drifts slightly. The groove is threatened.
gig_mid_tempo_wobble.opt1.label: Lock in [Skill]
gig_mid_tempo_wobble.opt1.outcome: You stare each other into perfect timing.
gig_mid_tempo_wobble.opt2.label: Just blast through [-150 Score]
gig_mid_tempo_wobble.title: TEMPO WOBBLE
hitchhiker.desc: A figure stands in the rain with a guitar case.
hitchhiker.opt1.label: Pick them up
hitchhiker.opt2.label: Drive past
hitchhiker.title: MYSTERIOUS HITCHHIKER
hospitality_win.desc: The venue actually feeds you. Like, real food.
hospitality_win.opt1.label: Eat like kings [+10 Mood]
hospitality_win.title: HOSPITALITY WIN
insurance_forms.opt1.label: Spend time on it [-1h, +5 Mood]
insurance_forms.opt2.label: Ignore it [Luck]
insurance_forms.title: INSURANCE FORMS

internal_dispute.description: Matze findet, der neue Song sollte langsamer sein. Lars will ihn schneller.
internal_dispute.title: KREATIVE DIFFERENZEN

late_night_party.desc: The local scene invites you to an afterparty. It will be legendary, but exhausting.
late_night_party.opt1.label: Party Hard [-20 Stamina, +10 Mood]
late_night_party.opt3.outcome: You wake up with a headache but great memories.
late_night_party.opt4.label: Go to Sleep [+10 Stamina, -5 Mood]
late_night_party.title: LATE NIGHT PARTY
late_soundcheck_blame.desc: Soundcheck is late and everyone blames everyone.
late_soundcheck_blame.opt1.label: Take responsibility [-5 Mood, +5 Harmony]
late_soundcheck_blame.opt2.label: Call it out [-8 Harmony]
late_soundcheck_blame.title: BLAME GAME
legendary_patch_trader.desc: A strange collector offers a legendary patch for a price.
legendary_patch_trader.opt1.label: Buy it [-80€]
legendary_patch_trader.opt2.label: Decline
legendary_patch_trader.opt2.outcome: You walk away. The air shimmers.
legendary_patch_trader.title: PATCH TRADER
lost_key.desc: The van key is missing. Panic spreads.
lost_key.opt1.label: Search thoroughly [-1h]
lost_key.opt1.outcome: Found it under a merch box. Of course.
lost_key.opt2.label: Call locksmith [-120€]
lost_key.title: LOST KEY
lost_setlist_notes.desc: Your setlist notes disappeared. The show is tonight.
lost_setlist_notes.opt1.label: Rewrite from memory [Skill]
lost_setlist_notes.opt2.label: Wing it
lost_setlist_notes.title: LOST NOTES
merch_big_sale.desc: A surprise crowd actually buys stuff.
merch_big_sale.opt1.label: Count the cash [+180€]
merch_big_sale.opt1.outcome: This is why you carried boxes.
merch_big_sale.title: MERCH BLOWOUT
merch_restock_opportunity.desc: A friend offers a cheap print run—today only.
merch_restock_opportunity.opt1.label: Restock [-120€]
merch_restock_opportunity.opt1.outcome: New shirts smell like fresh ink.
merch_restock_opportunity.opt2.label: Skip it
merch_restock_opportunity.opt2.outcome: You hope you won’t regret it.
merch_restock_opportunity.title: CHEAP MERCH RESTOCK
merch_table_duty.desc: Nobody wants to run the merch table after the set.
merch_table_duty.opt1.label: You do it [-5 Stamina, +10€]
merch_table_duty.opt2.label: Force Marius [-5 Harmony]
merch_table_duty.opt2.outcome: He does it, but he remembers.
merch_table_duty.title: MERCH TABLE DUTY
midnight_radio.desc: The radio plays a song that sounds exactly like your next album.
midnight_radio.opt1.label: Record it [+2 Skill]
midnight_radio.opt2.label: Turn it off [-5 Mood]
midnight_radio.title: MIDNIGHT RADIO
missed_exit.desc: Someone talked over the GPS. You missed the exit by miles.
missed_exit.opt1.label: Take the next exit [-1h]
missed_exit.opt2.label: Blame someone [-5 Harmony]
missed_exit.title: MISSED EXIT
mysterious_producer.desc: A shadowy figure offers to “elevate your sound.”
mysterious_producer.opt1.label: Accept [+Skill, -Harmony]
mysterious_producer.opt2.label: Refuse [+Luck]
mysterious_producer.title: MYSTERIOUS PRODUCER
new_song_debut_fear.desc: Someone suggests playing the new song tonight. The room goes quiet.
new_song_debut_fear.opt1.label: Do it [+10 Hype, Risk]
new_song_debut_fear.opt2.label: No new songs [+5 Harmony]
new_song_debut_fear.title: NEW SONG PANIC
parking_fine.desc: You parked in a no-stopping zone to unload.
parking_fine.opt1.label: Pay fine [-35€]
parking_fine.title: PARKING TICKET
police_control.desc: Blue lights flash behind you. 'Allgemeine Verkehrskontrolle'.
police_control.opt1.label: Cooperate [Safe]
police_control.opt1.outcome: They checked the tires and let you go. Boring.
police_control.opt2.label: Talk your way out [Charisma]
police_control.opt2.outcome: You rolled down the window with a smile.
police_control.opt3.label: Flee! [Driving Skill]
police_control.title: POLICE CONTROL
practice_room_rage.desc: A riff loop turns into an argument. Again.
practice_room_rage.opt1.label: Push through [Skill]
practice_room_rage.opt2.label: Call it a day [+5 Mood, -5 Progress]
practice_room_rage.title: PRACTICE ROOM RAGE
rainstorm_drive.desc: Rain hits like a wall. Visibility drops.
rainstorm_drive.opt1.label: Drive slowly [-1h]
rainstorm_drive.opt2.label: Push through [Stamina]
rainstorm_drive.title: RAINSTORM
random_refund.desc: A forgotten deposit comes back to you.
random_refund.opt1.label: Nice. [+70€]
random_refund.title: RANDOM REFUND
rehearsal_room_discount.desc: Your rehearsal space owner offers a discount if you play a private show.
rehearsal_room_discount.opt1.label: Agree [+100€]
rehearsal_room_discount.opt2.label: Decline
rehearsal_room_discount.title: REHEARSAL ROOM DISCOUNT
rest_stop_fight.desc: A random guy comments on your van. Marius is ready to fight.
rest_stop_fight.opt1.label: De-escalate [Charisma]
rest_stop_fight.opt1.outcome: You try to be the adult.
rest_stop_fight.opt2.label: Leave fast [-0.5h]
rest_stop_fight.title: REST STOP DRAMA
road_rage.opt1.label: Brake check
road_rage.opt2.label: Let them pass
road_rage.title: ROAD RAGE
scenic_route.desc: The satnav suggests a longer but nicer route.
scenic_route.opt1.label: Take it
scenic_route.opt2.label: Stay on highway
scenic_route.title: SCENIC ROUTE
setlist_argument.desc: Marius wants more fast songs. Lars wants more “groove”.
setlist_argument.opt1.label: Go faster (Side with Marius)
setlist_argument.opt2.label: Go groovier (Side with Lars)
setlist_argument.opt3.label: Compromise [Charisma]
setlist_argument.opt3.outcome: You negotiate like a tired diplomat.
setlist_argument.title: SETLIST ARGUMENT
sleeping_floor_fight.desc: The floor spot looks… worse than usual. Everybody wants the couch.
sleeping_floor_fight.opt1.label: Draw straws [Luck]
sleeping_floor_fight.opt2.label: You take the floor [+5 Harmony, -5 Stamina]
sleeping_floor_fight.title: SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS
sore_throat.opt1.label: Buy tea & honey [-10€]
sore_throat.opt2.label: Ignore it [-5 Mood]
sore_throat.title: SORE THROAT
speed_trap.desc: FLASH! You were going 130 in a 100 zone.
speed_trap.opt1.label: Pay fine [-30€]
speed_trap.title: BLITZER
sponsor_offer.desc: A local energy drink wants to sponsor one show.
sponsor_offer.opt1.label: Accept [+300€, -5 Credibility]
sponsor_offer.opt1.outcome: You played next to a neon fridge.
sponsor_offer.opt2.label: Decline [+5 Mood]
sponsor_offer.title: WEIRD SPONSOR OFFER
strange_roadside_shrine.desc: You find a small shrine made of guitar picks and candles.
strange_roadside_shrine.opt1.label: Leave an offering [-10€]
strange_roadside_shrine.opt2.label: Take a pick [Risk]
strange_roadside_shrine.title: ROADSIDE SHRINE
synergy_moment.desc: {{member1}} and {{member2}} are totally in sync. The positive energy at the {{venue}} is infectious.
synergy_moment.opt1.label: Ride the wave [+10 Harmony, +10 Mood]
synergy_moment.title: PERFECT SYNERGY
tax_audit.desc: A grey envelope arrives. Something about "Umsatzsteuer".
tax_audit.opt1.label: Call Tax Advisor [-150€]
tax_audit.opt1.outcome: He sorted it out. Expensive but safe.
tax_audit.opt2.label: Ignore it [Risk]
tax_audit.opt2.outcome: You threw it in the trash.
tax_audit.title: FINANZAMT LETTER
tempo_police.desc: Marius insists everyone is rushing. Lars insists Marius is dragging.
tempo_police.opt1.label: Do metronome drills [-10 Stamina, +8 Harmony]
tempo_police.opt2.label: Ignore it [-6 Harmony]
tempo_police.title: TEMPO POLICE
the_other_band.desc: A band “from another timeline” offers to swap setlists for one night.
the_other_band.opt1.label: Swap [Skill]
the_other_band.opt1.outcome: It’s either legendary or a trainwreck.
the_other_band.opt2.label: Decline
the_other_band.title: THE OTHER BAND
tire_pressure_warning.desc: A warning light appears. The van looks innocent.
tire_pressure_warning.opt1.label: Check it [-0.5h]
tire_pressure_warning.opt1.outcome: It was low. Now it’s fine.
tire_pressure_warning.opt2.label: Ignore [Risk]
tire_pressure_warning.title: TIRE PRESSURE WARNING
towed_van.desc: You come back and the van is gone. Amazing.
towed_van.opt1.label: Pay impound [-220€]
towed_van.opt2.label: Try to charm the clerk [Charisma]
towed_van.title: TOWED VAN
toxic_infighting.desc: The tension between {{member1}} and {{member2}} finally boils over. They are screaming at each other in the {{venue}}.
toxic_infighting.opt1.label: Intervene [Charisma]
toxic_infighting.opt2.label: Let them fight it out
toxic_infighting.opt3.outcome: Sometimes toxicity has to run its course.
toxic_infighting.title: {{MEMBER1}} AND {{MEMBER2}} AT EACH OTHER'S THROATS
traffic_jam.opt1.label: Wait it out [-2h]
traffic_jam.opt2.label: Take backroads [-1h, Risk]
traffic_jam.title: AUTOBAHN STAU
unexpected_bill.desc: The rehearsal room rent was increased retroactively.
unexpected_bill.opt1.label: Pay it [-50€]
unexpected_bill.title: UNEXPECTED BILL
unexpected_donation.desc: A fan insists on giving you cash “for gas”.
unexpected_donation.opt1.label: Accept [+50€]
unexpected_donation.opt2.label: Refuse [+3 Harmony]
unexpected_donation.title: UNEXPECTED DONATION
van_breakdown_engine.desc: Steam hisses from the hood. The temperature gauge is in the red.
van_breakdown_engine.opt1.label: Professional Repair [-200€, -4h]
van_breakdown_engine.opt1.outcome: Expensive, but necessary. The van runs smoother now.
van_breakdown_engine.opt2.label: Duct Tape & Prayer [Tech Check]
van_breakdown_engine.title: VAN BREAKDOWN: ENGINE
van_breakdown_tire.desc: A loud BANG echoes on the autobahn. The van swerves violently.
van_breakdown_tire.opt1.label: Call ADAC [-50€, -2h]
van_breakdown_tire.opt2.outcome: The tow truck arrived late. At least the tire is fixed.
van_breakdown_tire.opt3.label: Change it yourself [Stamina Check]
van_breakdown_tire.opt4.outcome: You decided to get your hands dirty.
van_breakdown_tire.title: VAN BREAKDOWN: TIRE
van_cleaning_fee.desc: You return a room key and get charged for “excessive mess”.
van_cleaning_fee.opt1.label: Pay [-40€]
van_cleaning_fee.opt2.label: Argue [Charisma]
van_cleaning_fee.opt2.outcome: You try to talk your way out.
van_cleaning_fee.title: CLEANING FEE
van_critical_failure.desc: The duct tape didn't hold. The engine block cracked. You need a tow.
van_critical_failure.opt1.label: Wait for cheap tow [-100€, -1d]
van_critical_failure.opt2.outcome: You spent the night in a ditch, but the mechanic fixed it cheap.
van_critical_failure.opt3.label: Scrap it & Rent [-500€]
van_critical_failure.opt3.outcome: The old van is gone. You are driving a rental now.
van_critical_failure.title: CRITICAL FAILURE
van_silence.desc: Nobody talks for an hour. It’s not peaceful. It’s tension.
van_silence.opt1.label: Crack a joke [Charisma]
van_silence.opt1.outcome: You try to break the ice.
van_silence.opt2.label: Let it be
van_silence.title: THE SILENCE
van_smell_attack.desc: Something in the van smells… alive.
van_smell_attack.opt1.label: Stop and clean [-0.5h, +5 Mood]
van_smell_attack.opt2.label: Ignore it [-5 Mood]
van_smell_attack.title: VAN SMELL ATTACK
venue_short_pay.desc: The promoter claims “low turnout” and offers less money.
venue_short_pay.opt1.label: Accept it [-10 Mood]
venue_short_pay.opt2.label: Argue [Charisma]
venue_short_pay.title: SHORT PAY
vocal_warmup_cringe.desc: Someone starts intense warmups in the van. Everyone suffers.
vocal_warmup_cringe.opt1.label: Join in [+5 Harmony]
vocal_warmup_cringe.opt2.label: Beg for silence [-5 Mood]
vocal_warmup_cringe.title: VOCAL WARMUP CRINGE
wild_accident.desc: A deer jumps onto the road!
wild_accident.opt1.label: Swerve! [Reflex Check]
wild_accident.title: WILD UNFALL
writers_block.desc: The band is stuck on a new riff. Frustration is rising.
writers_block.opt1.label: Push through [Skill Check]
writers_block.opt2.outcome: You spent hours in the practice room.
writers_block.opt3.label: Take a break [-50€]
writers_block.opt4.outcome: Sometimes you just need a distraction.
writers_block.title: WRITER'S BLOCK
wrong_turn.desc: The GPS lied. You are in the middle of nowhere.
wrong_turn.opt1.label: Turn back
wrong_turn.opt2.d_d549: Found a hidden record store! +Rare Vinyl
wrong_turn.opt2.label: Explore the area
wrong_turn.title: WRONG TURN
